name: CBCharacteristicProperties
desc: Values that represent the possible properties of a characteristic.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a characteristic properties instance from the given raw value.

items.name: static var broadcast: CBCharacteristicProperties
items.desc: A property that indicates the characteristic can broadcast its value using a characteristic configuration descriptor.

items.name: static var read: CBCharacteristicProperties
items.desc: A property that indicates a peripheral can read the characteristic’s value.

items.name: static var writeWithoutResponse: CBCharacteristicProperties
items.desc: A property that indicates a peripheral can write the characteristic’s value, without a response to indicate that the write succeeded.

items.name: static var write: CBCharacteristicProperties
items.desc: A property that indicates a peripheral can write the characteristic’s value, with a response to indicate that the write succeeded.

items.name: static var notify: CBCharacteristicProperties
items.desc: A property that indicates the peripheral permits notifications of the characteristic’s value, without a response from the central to indicate receipt of the notification.

items.name: static var indicate: CBCharacteristicProperties
items.desc: A property that indicates the peripheral permits notifications of the characteristic’s value, with a response from the central to indicate receipt of the notification.

items.name: static var authenticatedSignedWrites: CBCharacteristicProperties
items.desc: A property that indicates the perhipheral allows signed writes of the characteristic’s value, without a response to indicate the write succeeded.

items.name: static var extendedProperties: CBCharacteristicProperties
items.desc: A property that indicates the characteristic defines additional properties in the extended properties descriptor.

items.name: static var notifyEncryptionRequired: CBCharacteristicProperties
items.desc: A property that indicates that only trusted devices can enable notifications of the characteristic’s value.

items.name: static var indicateEncryptionRequired: CBCharacteristicProperties
items.desc: A property that indicates only trusted devices can enable indications of the characteristic’s value.
